tool_description: Get list of different currencies quotes to the base quote
name: Quotes
title: Quotes

api_list.name: Get History
api_list.description: Get last quotes for the last N-days
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quotes39.p.rapidapi.com/api/GetHistory/7/0/USD"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quotes39.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://quotes39.p.rapidapi.com/api/GetHistory/{days}/{group}/{basecurrencysymbol}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quotes39.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Rates
